resources.string: Please refer to the attached APP for module precautions and troubleshooting.

Task view blur is set to

It is detected that you are using this module for the first time, the module will set the default value, and then restart the desktop.\nIf you need further settings,please wait for the System launcher to restart and open the home screen settings again.
The entered value will be divided by
Please enter a value within the allowable range!

Please activate this module in the LSPosed Manager and restart the MIUI Launcher once.\nThe module settings are in the settings of the Home screen!\nSpecific location: Settings - Home screen - Where the \"Default launcher\" used to be.

Notices:
1.This module currently only support LSPosed 5606 or above, it does not going to support any other Xposed frameworks at present.

2.When some options are invalid, please check whether the launcher version installed on your current device is the latest ALPHA version. If you confirm that it is correct, please try to re-optimize in the LSPosed manager And restart the System launcher.
Hook for MIUI Launcher.\nThe module settings are in the settings of the Home screen!
